handlers.code:
system.print("----------------------------------")
system.print("HoneycombsControl v0.3")
system.print("----------------------------------")
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

local Color = "50,100,255" --export: Main color RGB value
local FontColor = "255,255,255" --export Font color RGB value

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

for slot_name, slot in pairs(unit) do
    if type(slot) == "table"
        and type(slot.export) == "table"
        and slot.getClass
        then
        if slot.getClass() == 'ScreenUnit' then
            Screen = slot
            slot.activate()
        elseif slot.getClass() == 'Industry1' then
            Industry = slot
        end
    end
end

Screen.setRenderScript([[
    local color2 = {r=]]..Split(FontColor, ",")[1]..[[/255,g=]]..Split(FontColor, ",")[2]..[[/255,b=]]..Split(FontColor, ",")[3]..[[/255}
    local color1 = {r=]]..Split(Color, ",")[1]..[[/255,g=]]..Split(Color, ",")[2]..[[/255,b=]]..Split(Color, ",")[3]..[[/255}
]]..ScreenContent)    

unit.setTimer("UPD")

AmountToCraft = AmountToCraft or 1
Index = Index or 1
MaxIndex = MaxIndex or 1

    local RecipesPerPage = 36
    local MouseWheel = system.getMouseWheel()
    local output = json.decode(Screen.getScriptOutput())

if output ~= nil then
    MaxIndex = math.ceil(output.RecipesCount / RecipesPerPage) -- number of pages
    if MaxIndex < 1 then MaxIndex = 1 end
    if output.StopButtonPressed then
        Screen.clearScriptOutput()
        Industry.stop(1,0)
    end
    if output.CraftButtonPressed then
        Industry.setCurrentSchematic(output.ID)
        Industry.startFor(AmountToCraft)
        Screen.clearScriptOutput()
    end
    if output.CraftButtonActive then    
        AmountToCraft = math.floor(AmountToCraft + MouseWheel)
        if AmountToCraft < 1 then AmountToCraft = 1 end
        if AmountToCraft > 99 then AmountToCraft = 99 end
    else
        Index = math.floor(Index + MouseWheel)
        if Index < 1 then Index = 1 end
        if Index > MaxIndex then Index = MaxIndex end
    end
end

local input = {
    ["Index"] = Index,
    ["State"] = Industry.getState(),
    ["AmountToCraft"] = AmountToCraft,
    ["MaxIndex"] = MaxIndex,
    ["ArkTime"] = system.getArkTime()
}

--for key, Screen in pairs(Screens) do
    Screen.setScriptInput(json.encode(input))

ScreenContent = [[

if not _init then

    Selection, Category = "", ""
    List = {}

    function AddText(Layer,align,color,font,text,x,y)
        setNextTextAlign(Layer, align, AlignV_Middle)        
        setNextFillColor(Layer, color.r, color.g, color.b, 1)  
        addText(Layer, font, text, x,y) 
    end

    function AddButton(Layer,X,Y,Width,Height,Text,Align,Font,cx,cy,Color1,Color2,Data)
        AddText(Layer,Align,Color2,Font,Text,X,Y) 
        if cx > X-Width*0.5 and cx < X+Width*0.5 and cy > Y-Height*0.5 and cy < Y+Height*0.5 or Category == Text or Selection == Text then 

            if Data == "CraftButton" then CraftButtonActive = true else CraftButtonActive = false end
            CraftButtonPressed = false
            StopButtonPressed = false

            setNextFillColor(Layer,Color1.r,Color1.g,Color1.b,0.5) -- box background
            addBox(Layer,X-Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5,Width,Height)
            setDefaultStrokeColor(Layer, Shape_Line, Color2.r, Color2.g, Color2.b, 1)
            local l=10
            addLine(Layer,X-Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5,X-Width*0.5+l,Y-Height*0.5)
            addLine(Layer,X-Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5,X-Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5+l)
            addLine(Layer,X+Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5,X+Width*0.5-l,Y-Height*0.5)
            addLine(Layer,X+Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5,X+Width*0.5,Y-Height*0.5+l)
            addLine(Layer,X+Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5,X+Width*0.5-l,Y+Height*0.5)
            addLine(Layer,X+Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5,X+Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5-l)
            addLine(Layer,X-Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5,X-Width*0.5+l,Y+Height*0.5)
            addLine(Layer,X-Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5-l,X-Width*0.5,Y+Height*0.5)
            if getCursorReleased() then
                if Data == "category" then
                    Category = Text

                elseif Data == "CraftButton" then
                    if ID ~= nil then CraftButtonPressed = true end

                elseif Data == "StopButton" then
                    StopButtonPressed = true

                elseif Data ~= "" then 
                    Selection = Text
                    ID = Data
                end
            end
        end
    end

    _init = true 
end

local rx, ry = getResolution()
local tilesX, tilesY = 4, 18
local cx,cy=getCursor()

-- Determine the tile dimensions
local tileW, tileH = rx / tilesX, ry / tilesY
local layer = createLayer()

local Font = loadFont("Play", 17) 
local Font2 = loadFont("Play-Bold", 22) 
local Font3 = loadFont("Play-Bold", 38) 

local skip = 3
local recipesperpage = (tilesX*tilesY)/2

if Category == "Aluminium" then List = {{["Name"]="Aged Aluminium",["ID"]=256077389},{["Name"]="Aged gray pattern aluminium",["ID"]=1244246356},{["Name"]="Aluminium Painted if Category == "Silumin" then List = {{["Name"]="silumin Aged",["ID"]=171916190},{["Name"]="silumin Glossy",["ID"]=757719426},{["Name"]="silumin Matte",["ID"]=970767225},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Black",["ID"]=1113931078},{["Name"]="silumin Painted DarkGray",["ID"]=1372528549},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Gray",["ID"]=91293884},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Green",["ID"]=2124718837},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Ice",["ID"]=1249495508},{["Name"]="silumin Painted LightGray",["ID"]=1101198790},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Military",["ID"]=802004952},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Orange",["ID"]=881801359},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Purple",["ID"]=1843316070},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Red",["ID"]=1249461716},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Sky",["ID"]=1241945599},{["Name"]="silumin Painted White",["ID"]=1761780314},{["Name"]="silumin Painted Yellow",["ID"]=2053655358},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Black",["ID"]=1980376308},{["Name"]="silumin Panel DarkGray",["ID"]=1439907140},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Gray",["ID"]=1278214808},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Green",["ID"]=1903629305},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Ice",["ID"]=1437187143},{["Name"]="silumin Panel LightGray",["ID"]=1862492096},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Military",["ID"]=930089984},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Orange",["ID"]=822859026},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Purple",["ID"]=2052204264},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Red",["ID"]=1437125855},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Sky",["ID"]=1437129607},{["Name"]="silumin Panel White",["ID"]=136349423},{["Name"]="silumin Panel Yellow",["ID"]=630585344}} end

local json = require('dkjson')
local input = json.decode(getInput()) or {}
Index = input.Index or 1
State = input.State or ""
Amount = input.AmountToCraft or 1
MaxIndex = input.MaxIndex
ArkTime = input.ArkTime or 0

i = recipesperpage * (Index-1)

-- For each step in Y
for y = 0, tilesY - skip+1 do

    -- For each step in X
    for x = 0, tilesX - 1 do

        if y == skip+1 then
            if x == 0 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Aluminium",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 1 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Iron",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 2 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Carbon",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 3 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Silicon",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
        end

        if y == skip+2 then
            if x == 0 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Wood",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 1 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Brick",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 2 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Plastic",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 3 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Carbon Fiber",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
        end

        if y == skip+3 then
            if x == 0 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Steel",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
            if x == 1 then AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,"Silumin",AlignH_Center,Font2,cx,cy,color1,color2,"category") end
        end

        if i < #List and y > skip+4  and i < recipesperpage*Index and #List > 0 then
            i = i+1    
            AddButton(layer,x * tileW+tileW*0.5,y * tileH+tileH*0.5,tileW,tileH,List[i].Name,AlignH_Center,Font,cx,cy,color1,color2,List[i].ID)
        end

    end
end

background = "assets.prod.novaquark.com/70186/6e043de3-fe9f-4798-add4-d1665a197491.png"
background = loadImage(background)
addImage(layer, background, 20, -10, 128, 128)

function Industry_State(str)

if str == 1 then return "Stopped"
elseif str == 2 then return "Running"
elseif str == 3 then return "Missing Ingredients"
elseif str == 4 then return "Output Full"
elseif str == 5 then return "No Output Container"
elseif str == 6 then return "Pending"
elseif str == 7 then return "Missing Schematics"
end


end


AddText(layer,AlignH_Left,color1,Font3,Industry_State(State), rx*0.16, ry*0.05)        
AddText(layer,AlignH_Left,color1,Font2,"Selection: "..Selection, rx*0.16, ry*0.15)
AddText(layer,AlignH_Left,color1,Font2,#List .. " " .. Category .. " " .. "Recipes", rx*0.16, ry*0.105)

setDefaultStrokeWidth(layer, Shape_Line, 3)
setDefaultStrokeColor(layer, Shape_Line, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
addLine(layer,rx*0.02,ry*0.19,rx*0.98,ry*0.19)
addLine(layer,rx*0.02,ry*0.42,rx*0.98,ry*0.42)    

local v = 55
local s = rx*0.4525 - (MaxIndex*v)/2
for i = 1, MaxIndex do
    if i == Index then o = 1 else o = 0.4 end
    setNextFillColor(layer, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, o)
    addBoxRounded(layer,s+(i*v),ry*0.954,rx*0.04,18,20)
end

AddButton(layer,rx*0.885,ry*0.041,180,46,"Craft "..Amount,AlignH_Center,Font3,cx,cy,color1,color2,"CraftButton")
setNextFillColor(layer, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 0.6)
addBoxRounded(layer,rx*0.885-90,ry*0.041-23,180,46,10)

AddButton(layer,rx*0.885,ry*0.13,180,46,"Stop",AlignH_Center,Font3,cx,cy,color1,color2,"StopButton")
setNextFillColor(layer, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 0.6)
addBoxRounded(layer,rx*0.885-90,ry*0.13-23,180,46,10)

local out = {
    ["StopButtonPressed"] = StopButtonPressed,
    ["CraftButtonActive"] = CraftButtonActive,
    ["CraftButtonPressed"] = CraftButtonPressed,
    ["ID"] = ID,
    ["RecipesCount"] = #List
}

setOutput(json.encode(out))
requestAnimationFrame(30)



OldArkTime = OldArkTime or 1
if OldArkTime == ArkTime then
    inactive = createLayer()
    setNextTextAlign(inactive, AlignH_Center, AlignV_Middle)        
    setNextFillColor(inactive, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)  
    addText(inactive, Font3, "Activate Board To Start", rx*0.5, ry*0.7)  
    setNextFillColor(inactive, 0.125, 0.125, 0.125, 0.9)
    addBox(inactive,0,0,rx,ry)

function AddLine(X,Y)
addLine(inactive,X,Y,X+rx*0.03,Y+ry*0.06)
addLine(inactive,X+rx*0.03,Y+ry*0.06,X+rx*0.06,Y)
end


setDefaultStrokeColor(inactive, Shape_Line, color1.r, color1.g, color1.b, 1)
setDefaultStrokeWidth(inactive, Shape_Line, 6)

cc = cc or 0.06
cc = cc+0.025
if cc>0.45 then cc = 0.06 end

AddLine(rx*0.5-rx*0.03,ry*cc+ry*0.7)
requestAnimationFrame(2)


else
    OldArkTime = ArkTime
end

]]


function Split(s, delimiter)
    result = {};
    for match in (s..delimiter):gmatch("(.-)"..delimiter) do
        table.insert(result, match);
    end
    return result;
end
